description:
Super hot guy who could easily pass as Billy Baldwin's twin. Said he's "99% straight" but a little curious. Works as a fitness consultant and has a girlfriend in graduate school. He was very apologetic about his chest hair and said he could shave it if we wanted him to (of course I said "DON'T!").
Well-built guy with exotic eyes, nice muscles, and a big dick. Kind of shy in the beginning. Pops a nice big load!
19-year-old skateboarder with a nice, smooth swimmer's build and an uncut dick. Said that he is bisexual but prefers girls.
title: Auditions 12
